update blog
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
views = #{views},
appreciation=1,
appreciation=0,
share_statement =1,
share_statement =0,
commentabled=1,
commentabled=0,
published = 1,
published = 0,
update_time = #{updateTime},
first_picture = #{firstPicture},
flag = #{flag},
type_id = #{typeId},
user_id = #{userId},
description = #{description}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.id bid, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.appreciation, b.share_statement, b.commentabled, b.published, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.type_id, b.user_id, b.description, t.name tname, t.id tid, ty.id tyid, ty.name tyname from blog as b left join blog_tag bt on b.id = bt.blog_id left join tag t on t.id = bt.tag_id left join type ty on b.type_id = ty.id where b.id = #{id};
